Name: Zombie valley
About the game: This is a first person action game,Players are surrounded by monsters that mutate into zombies，Players can explore the valley freely,The player must dodge the monster's attack or kill the monster to survive as long as possible. Control keys: Right-click targeting WASD movement The left Shift running Left mouse button attack Space leaping The left Ctrl squats Mouse control direction
